name: Danger Room
description: Survive the holographic barrage of turrets in the Danger Room on the HTC Vive. Slow time, dodge lasers, suck bullets and fire them back at enemies!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290, equivalent or better
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
